item.title: Outside 60-90, 8th December
item.description:
A lengthy area covered by temporary lights making it dangerous for householders to drive onto Redington Rd. Better served by closing Road except for access and diverting through Templewood Av, which is wider. I repeat Dangerous, and to day no sign of workmen,but due to remain till 19 Dec, and longer ?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 87.5, Redington Road, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish is being continually dumped on patch on land next to London Road, 8th December
item.description:
Since the trees have been cut back again on the patch of land adjacent to London Road people have been continually dumping rubbish here. This is happening daily and is an eyesore from the flats above - there is also more graffiti on the side of the garage wall facing the main road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bromley Hill, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing Fly Tipping, 8th December
item.description:
This is a problem spot where people from the road and around the area continue to fly tip rubbish, household goods and furniture. The signs do not seem to be a deterrent, more action needs to be taken to catch these culprits who are fly tipping and bringing rodents (Rats) on our road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Herbert Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clarence Road, Hackney, London
